messages.1000061005: When a #yfire#w attribute attack accurately hits an enemy with #yburns#w, additional damage is given at a certain probability.\n#yAdditional damage of {0}% of skill ATK is given\nActivation rate {1}%
messages.1000072287:
Fireball's maximum charging attack power is increased and Special Attack button can launch the attack in 3 directions. 
#yFireball's max charging ATK: +{0}%
ATK for each 3-direction attack (Level 2) : {1}%
ATK for each 3-direction attack (Level 3) : {2}%
messages.1000096232:
Hot magma is pumped up from underground and rolled to the front. Magma will explode after moving a certain distance and give great damage.
#yFire Attribute
#yATK: {0}%
Total {1} burn attacks
Magical ATK per burn: {2}%
messages.1000093731: Inferno's attack area is increased. Explosion will occur if Inferno is used until the end or if Normal Attack button is used. Enemies hit by the explosion will get damage that reduces Critical Resistance.\n#yExplosion ATK (Inferno's {0}%)\nFlame resistance for enemies hit reduced by {1}% (for {2} sec)
messages.1000072285: During Fire Wall, enter Normal Attack Button to throw flames to the front to give additional damage.\n#yAdditional hit ATK (Fire Wall's {0}~{1}%)
messages.1000090395: Explosion will occur where the Flame Road passed by.\n#yATK per explosion ({0}% of Flame Road)\nCan be cancelled with Tumble while the skill is being used
messages.1000059838: Fire attack power is enhanced by #y{0}%#w.
messages.1000075701: Summoned magma ball can be moved for a while and can be fired with #yLeft Click#w. The magma ball will be fired automatically after some time when it is not manually fired. \n#yAdditional explosive damage {0}%
messages.1000098558:
When #y[Flame Spark]#w and #y[Phoenix Storm]#w are used, #y[Fireball EX]#w changes to Instant for a while and can be used immediately in 3 levels. When #y[Phoenix Storm]#w hits the enemy, #y[Fireball EX]#w Instant's cooldown is recovered by {0} sec.

#yOwn ATK increases by {1}%
Fireball does not share cooldown with Instant

messages.1000096233:
Inferno's attack area is increased. Explosion will occur if Inferno is used until the end or if Normal Attack button is used. Enemies hit by the explosion will get damage that reduces Critical Resistance. Also, Inferno causes burns.
#yExplosion ATK (Inferno's {0}%)
Flame resistance for enemies hit reduced by {1}% (for {2} sec)
